title: Onegai, Sore wo Yamenaide
original_name: お願い、それをやめないで
sinopse:
Ordinary office lady Ichika accidentally witnesses her boss' true nature. This is the start of Ichika's sweetly painful every day life. Do you want to try being loved by someone who's extremely sadistic?

(Source: Clairparfait)

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Doll
